sentences.sContent: Any hostilities could result in retaliation and further embroil U.N. troops in fighting.
sentences.sCn: 任何敌对活动都可能会招致报复，进而使联合国部队卷入战斗中。

remMethod.val: em(进入) + broil(争吵) → 进入争吵 → 使混乱， 使卷入纠纷

trans.tranCn: 使卷入, 牵连, 使纠缠
trans.tranOther: to involve someone or something in a difficult situation
